Miscellaneous Highlights: India will face South Africa in the T20 World Cup 2024 final
South Africa qualified for their first-ever World Cup Final
India won the inaugural title in 2007
Others: The T20 World Cup 2024 final will take place on Saturday, June 29 2024
The grand final of the T20 World Cup 2024 will be played at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados
